== Erattupetta (CT) (628138) ==

Erattupetta (CT) is a town in the [[Meenachil]] taluka of [[Kottayam]] district with an area of 18.29 sq. km. and harbouring 7686 households with total population of 34814 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kottayam]] is at a distance of 40 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 179 km. Male population is 17555 and female population is 17259. Scheduled Caste population is 423 and Scheduled Tribes population is 202. Census Location Code of the town is 628138<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Alappuzha (m + og) at a distance of 38 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 62 km. Railway station is at Ettumanoor at a distance of 24 km.
